description:
The Royal Knights arrive at the floating dungeon at the Gravito Stones, which is where the Eye of the Midnight Sun’s hideout is. Mereoleona orders them to split into five different teams and they begin their assault. Asta heads in with Mereoleona and Zora Ideale. Meanwhile, Captain Nozel of the Silver Eagles also heads in, vowing to get revenge for a fallen rival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angriff auf das Hauptquartier des Kalten Auges der Mitternachtssonne!!!
Storming the Eye of the Midnight Sun`s Hideout!!!
À l`assaut de l`antre de l`ennemi
白夜の魔眼アジト 突入!!!
